input.sentences: a group of bikes waiting to be ridden .
the bikers start off on their ride .
the cow statue wearing a face mask .
the rider is locking his bike up at night .
output.sentences: A group of bikes are waiting for their riders.
A group of riders rides down the streets.
A group of cars wait in traffic on the road.
An artificial cow looks on with it's nose covered in a mask.
A person with a bike helmet puts a mask around one of those cows.
